title: Upcoming shroud.com Update. Mailing List Reminder As Well.
post:
Dan:
 I asked him that was publishing the image of Sanlucar de Barrameda’s Shroud:
http://lasabanaylosescepticos.blogspot.com.es/ 
….which shows in positive what it appreciates in the Shrouds of Noalejo (does it know them?), Xabrega and Lier.
Is not he interested in them?
Carlos
author: Carlos

title: Upcoming shroud.com Update. Mailing List Reminder As Well.

(en español….¡mi inglés es deprimente!)
Dan:

http://lasabanaylosescepticos.blogspot.com.es/ 
….que muestra en positivo lo que se aprecia en las Sábanas de Noalejo (¿las conoce?), Xabregas y Lier.
